constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 127 (Friday, July 29, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CRAWFORD:
H.R. 8606
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 3 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H7539]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to prohibit the extension of certain contracts to procure rail rolling stock, and for other purposes.
